website_summaries.verdict: This is a gorgeous 6-piece starter kit with an upscale look and feel, and has all the pieces for a perfect yoga practice.
pros: Comes with everything you need to get started, with a thick mat, 2 yoga blocks, a mat towel, hand towel, and strap
Thicker mat provides great cushioning for sensitive knees and wrists, and is great for core work or Pilates if you have a touchy back
Comes in a wide variety of colors
cons: Mat is designed for one-sided use, and can slide on hardwood floors
Some people find the blocks inadequate or not strong enough

customer_reviews.title: Mat Makes Noise and Slides,  everything Else is great
customer_reviews.text: Everything is of really nice quality except the mat. The mat is very comfortable. I like the thickness because its easy on my joints in practice, but unfortunately makes A LOT of noise when I'm trying to change positions, which is disruptive during group practice. What's worse is it slides too much, which it shouldn't do. I decided I cannot use this in group classes and just use at home for stretching and planks.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: This is not a yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed to find out that this isn't a yoga mat. I brought it to class and was told it was a Pilates mat. It's too thick to do anything other than a mountain pose for yoga or else it stretches and slides you around. But it was really nice quality and the color matched the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for your money, for a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: What a great set. The mat is nice and thick, being an older woman I need that for my sore knees. The mat size towel is great for being on your back so you don't stick to the mat. The blocks are nice and I have found many videos to show me how to use them. The strap is great for stretching that extra little bit. This is a great bargain for the money! I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, love, love the mat! It is thicker then the typical Yoga mats...perfect for this Gramma's old bones! (-= Just a beginner @ Yoga, so have not used the blocks yet, but they seem sturdy. The black strap is easy to put on/take off and it fits, tho snugly, in my yoga bag, along with the towel n socks! The towels are fluffy and seem to be of good quality-though haven't used them a great deal, so not washed several times yet, so UNsure of how well they will "hold-up"...BUT, if they are as good of quality, as they appear to be...this set id definitely worth the money! I like the color too...a pretty and calming color, perfect, for Yoga!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Nana

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! The foam yoga mat puts less stress on your wrists and makes it comfortable to lie on your back. Also, the blocks and the yoga strap give you the ability to push yourself further or relieve stress on certain areas of the body. As for the towels, I haven't used them but they are nice and soft and people have suggested that you can put them underneath your butt to lift up your hips and create a better posture. The only downside to this product is that since the yoga mat is foam, indentions in the foam can be made very easily. Overall, I enjoy using this product and I highly suggest buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Colorblind?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the deal is but this is the 2nd one I had first one returned as blue green and 2 shades of purple. The item is supposed to all match and be the darker purple the towels are. Amazon made it right for me but seriously don't like writing bad reviews just buyers be warned.
customer_reviews.author: E. Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the towels and mat. I would speak to the foam yoga blocks, but my dog loved them first. They did make excellent messes, much to her satisfaction. (Tip: keep them away from children and animals!) That said, the mat is thick and helps tremendously. I love the color. The towels are nice, but wash them a few times absolutely alone. They may have dyed my entire load of laundry pink. Thankfully, it was just my cleaning microfiber towels! But still - these bleed terribly, even on cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L

customer_reviews.title: The towels are wonderful - we use them also for biking and keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Matt is 1/2" thick and nothing less! Provided a lot of cushion for my knees. The towels are wonderful - we use them also for biking and keep the smaller one in a bag on our bike to wipe down after riding. The larger we will place in our vehicle on the seat to absorb perspiration from getting on to our seats. Haven't used the blocks yet. My husband uses the strap for stretches. The set overall covers all our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisann K

customer_reviews.title: Not Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Everything that came with this set I've had to reorder from a different brand. The mat is extremely slippery and is definitely not ideal for hot yoga. The blocks were okay, but everyone in a yoga studio uses the studio's blocks anyway. The mat towel it came with was absorbent, however it moved all over my mat as I changed positions. I had to get out of my position and fix my towel often. I would not recommend this set, as I have to replace it with an entire new set from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Rae

customer_reviews.title: The mat is really thick and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve used this set a couple Of times and I love it. I read the other reviews and was skeptical but I was pleasantly surprised at the quality, comfort and the colors. I Ordered the Teal set and they were true to the sellers description. I love this mat because there is extra padding, I use the set with my One Peloton app, they offer yoga classes and I’m definitely a beginner, but so far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Very thick mat. It really helped protect my knees when holding poses that are usually very hard on my knees. This mat stayed put and did njyr move around. I don't know if I like it as much as my normal yoga mat though. I'm wishing there was a middle ground between non-cushioned and cushioned. I'm still on the hunt for the perfect mat, but this is exactly as specified and a good quality. The towels are very nice and wash well.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two

customer_reviews.title: Broke after my first split
customer_reviews.text: I've never seen a yoga mat like this... The products arrived and look beautiful, the color is so calming, I was happy and excited, then started my regular warmup & stretching before pole, then... after one split, where my front feet lands broke... I questioned myself and moved to another spot & split again... and the second spot broke as well. Not sure if mine is extra weak or something. Amazing. Where did all those great reviews came from?
customer_reviews.author: arebise

customer_reviews.title: Product was sold as new but was previously opened and an item was missing
customer_reviews.text: The product was described as new and “Sivan Health and Fitness Yoga Set 6-Piece– Includes 1/2 Ultra Thick NBR Exercise Mat, 2 Yoga Blocks, 1 Yoga Mat Towel, 1 Yoga Hand Towel and a Yoga Strap”, however, the box was previously opened and retaped with the same original tape but it didn’t work. The seller either opened it or if it was a returned they didn’t even make sure the box was complete and they sold it as new. The yoga strap was missing.
customer_reviews.author: angies

customer_reviews.title: Everything a yogi needs!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this entire set! It is cheaper to buy this bundle vs getting each item separately however wish it was a bit cheaper. The towels are so soft and great quality! Love the blocks and strap. The mat is the best part! It’s thick as advertised and great support when practicing yoga. Only real con is the smell!!! The reviews are true, the yoga mat has a bad and odd odor. It’s been about 3 weeks and I’m still working on getting the smell out but the other products do not smell.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Squishy might not be what you need
customer_reviews.text: I got a new mat hoping it would help my wrists. I learned in a class that having too thick of a mat and working on carpet can change the angle of your wrist to a point that it hurts it worse. This could be a good mat if you have bad knees though. I'm also not a fan of the fact that the mat is easily punctured so be careful if you have pets or you want to try to use this outside. I also don't like that the mat stretches when used on top of carpet and doesn't fully shrink back when used regularly. I do really like the accessories that come with the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: 6-piece Yoga Set for LESS than the cost of most yoga carrying cases!!!
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY fast delivery (using my Prime membership). Love the variety of color choices. Particularly impressed with having the opportunity to purchase everything (6-pieces for less than the cost of most yoga carrying cases) I needed to start my wellness through yoga journey at such an unbelievably low price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for older people with pain issues or newbies.
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It comes with all the essentials to get started in yoga- Mat, blocks, towel, strap, carrying strap for mat. Is is also sleek, and matches so well. I love that I can do all the poses and there is no pressure on my knees, or anywhere where my body touches the mat. However, balancing poses are extra challenging cause the mat is extra thick and I can’t get my feet solid enough. It also doesn’t grip well, and on most studio surfaces, it squeaks when I move. I love that is is so cushy, but it doesn’t work for more intense practices. I use it for rejuvenating practices.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanGardener

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The mat is thick and comfy on hard floors. The carrying strap is handy and easy to use. The blocks are firm and sturdy. The towels are microfiber material and nice. However the mat does stretch quite a bit and it tears easily under your feet. Also the mat does have a bad chemical smell. I cleaned it with a lemon scented cleaner and left it unrolled for a few days and that seems to have helped.
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Quality in One Affordable Package!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only yoga mat you will ever need if you’re like me and have arthritic joints! I bought this after taking a yoga class initially because it came with everything I needed to practice, but I didn’t realize what a godsend that 0.5” thickness would become as I practiced daily. My knees and back thanked me. Because of this, I’ve been able to practice yoga in complete comfort without enflaming my joints and I recommend this brand to everyone looking to buy an affordable and good quality mat to use. It’s also incredibly easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Muse M.

customer_reviews.title: Strong Odor
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the towels had stains as did the mat. The mat also had a small perforation in one side. Both have a very bad odor that will not dissipate even after airing out. The blocks are wrapped well and appear solid, as does the strap. Will be returning as the mat has the hole in it and the odor has still not cleared, therefore, will not be able to use. Two stars as the blocks and strap seem fine. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Not for yoga!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an exercise mat to cusion your sit ups this is a great product. For yoga... Nope! It stretches in opposite directions in Downward Facing dog, and slides on a yoga studio hard wood floor. The blocks are okay for propping under the pelvis or in sitting or laying poses but are way to lightweight and flimsy to support you in a forearm stand, offer balance in warrior III or reverse 1/2 moon. The strap is great. The towels are cheap microfiber that sticks to your dry skin in a not so good way. Looks like a bargain but I would not reccomend this for actual yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L Burggraaf

customer_reviews.title: THSI PRODUCT IS DETAILED!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT comfy mat and big and easy to transport. I love everything about this set! EVERYTHING! I do not like this mat for certain balance poses but for everything else I LOVE THIS SET! I have this for over a year and a half and everything is still in good condition. I would be mindful with this around water after awhile because it can wether away at the mat just a little. Other then this everything is truly amazing. I love this set!
customer_reviews.author: EuroCali

customer_reviews.title: Just what a stiff-bodied guy needed
customer_reviews.text: Third mat I've owned and the first one I like. I didn't think I'd use the towels, but they are actually very useful depending on how sweaty I get. I also have horrible flexibility and always have, so the blocks are a must. There's also a strap that my wife says is for stretching. I lie on my back with it on my foot and stretch the back of my leg. It actually feels pretty nice. The mat itself is padded enough for our hard floors, is a fun color and gives me no grief. Hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Solumadur

customer_reviews.title: This set is as comfortable as it gets
customer_reviews.text: This set is as comfortable as it gets. It's a very soft mat that cleans up pretty easy. And it takes the rough and tough of a hard work out its durable as it can take the stretching of my feet during a hard plank session. The towels are excellent material, and has super absorbance, and pleasantly soft material, it's spa quality! overall a great set and will buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set for yoga
customer_reviews.text: Good starter set for yoga, although I don't use the towels at all. I wish the blocks were a little larger, and the mat tends to slide a little on hard-wood floors. Other than that it is great. This mat is thick and fluffy, not in the thin sticky-mat style of traditional yoga mats and good for those who like a little extra padding. I wish this set cost a little more and came with a yoga booster and blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Reba Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thick yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because if using those thin ones, my knees hurt when doing some yoga poses. This one is pretty thick and help me to relieve the pain when kneeing down. Did not use other stuff a lot. Love the purple color a lot though
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Ma

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is fine if you have no idea what yoga is and you don't own enough towels, but the quality is pretty mediocre and 40+ is way too much to pay. The mat already has a tear in it and it not very good quality. Maybe they increased the price because everyone is buying home work out stuff during this pandemic, but I would not buy this again for this price. None of the items feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: No bueno for hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: The microfiber towels are absorbent and I’ll definitely be using them. However the actual mat is very slippery. The material doesn’t work well with the yoga towel. Even when sprayed down. The thickness of the mat is nice but definitely not good for hot yoga. Will use for at home practice.
customer_reviews.author: stephko

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned but not for extensive use
customer_reviews.text: I love the cushion it gives me and I can say that I have never had knee, hand, or foot pain while maintaining my poses... BUT I have only had this product for about a week and half and used it maybe 8-10 times and it is already showing permanent indents where my hands and feet go. This mat is also very slick on the floor. Even with the towel, I find the mat itself slipping on the floor. Very disappointed because I do like the cushion and thickness of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Burk

customer_reviews.title: toxic smell
customer_reviews.text: This product releases such a toxic smell , I highly doubt it is healthy.Its the last thing you want when you are doing yoga. I tried to air it out as well as wash it and it still was so stinky that it gave me severe headaches. Unfortunately, I would not suggest to use or buy this product even if it were free :(
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom a few years ago. She uses it a few times per week, if not every day, and it’s still in great condition. Very cushioned mat. Color is just as advertised (awesome teal!). No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S Delgaudio

customer_reviews.title: Great color, nice set, and is perfect for yoga classes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for yoga classes at my gym. The whole set has come in handy and has been perfect for the hour long classes. The yoga mat is nice and thick, yet not to think to hinder poses or certain stretches. The blocks seem to be made well. The best part so far has been the strap, which was used to enhance stretches. The strap was way easier to use than the ones provided in class. One downside was the weird smell, which goes away after awhile. I also love the color, which I purchased the turquoise-colored set.
customer_reviews.author: Carisa

customer_reviews.title: I love that this comes with the strap for the mat ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my Sivan 6 piece yoga set! The color is a soothing green thats fits my style very well. The material is dense and appears to be well made. I love that this comes with the strap for the mat itself makes it much easier to transport around. Looking forward to getting lots of use out of all the pieces in the set! Shipping was prompt and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Steppe

customer_reviews.title: Its great!
customer_reviews.text: Mat: It isn't thin like some mats I've used in the past. I love the color. Towels: This works for me because i don't want to use just any towel. Strap: If you're one of those people like me ; that needs a bit of assistance then this strap is a huge help. Blocks: The blocks are so essential if you can't get into those easyish or tough positions. I'm not as flexible as i use to be, but im not ashamed to have a bit of help.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Found this same item for over one hundred dollars. Just the mat. If you are just getting into it or moving on to bikram, this is what you need. So much better for the knees, helps focus on the movement rather than if you are going to harm your knees. Buying more for extra Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick mat and blocks
customer_reviews.text: New to yoga and this set was awesome. So many people commented on mine that three other gals in the class bought them. nice thickness and the blocks are very durable. you get so much for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimakins

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I started a yoga class and did not know what I needed. I decided to purchase this set and it was exactly what I needed. It is strong and durable. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Fore

customer_reviews.title: Expect a little different than normal.
customer_reviews.text: The mat is "chunkier" than most yoga mats. Maybe a little more coosh is a good thing. Everything has a little chemical smell (opposite of zen) I will likely wash everything first. The blocks also seem narrower than other yoga blocks. I have yet to test their durability. I think everything looks like good quality. Very solid made. The color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Staples

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product
customer_reviews.text: My child ripped this open and was so excited to use it so my 7 year old did an ab 25 min workout and loved the thickness. The microfiber towel and face towel rock. He hasent used the leg tie, but its really tight and well made. Just a side note the blocks make great walls to keep out attacking armies of Legos and dinosaurs. Also don't attack the blocks roughly. Lego men do go through the plastic covering into the foam, but don't use them in your Lego battles and you'll avoid that issue. Even with the imprints he uses the blocks daily and they are awesome. Thanks for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen M Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Needed the Plush Support!
customer_reviews.text: The mat I had was way too thin for my flat feet and began to awaken my plantar fasciitis. I needed a plush foundation and this yoga mat does it for me as well as shock absorbs my movement where my joints do not feel the impact. The bonus of the towels and other supports are worth the price. Will purchase another one in a different color as I advance in my fitness journey.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for a yoga set with everything you need
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING yoga set! The items came packaged very nicely. And all items look just like they do in the picture. High quality materials, the yoga mat is super thick (which makes doing yoga on hard wood floors so much more comfortable). Have yet to use the towels, but they feel like other yoga towels I have used. The set is all standard items you would need while practicing yoga, but the quality is above average! Would definitely recommend (and I did! My roommate is also getting one)
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to take pictures yet, but I was very satisfied by this set. Everything came in a timely manner, the products are as described, and all together it was a really great purchase. The mat is soft and seems sturdy, it even took an accidental beating from dog paws and held up just fine. I'm still learning how to use the blocks, but they seem to be good quality and sturdy. The towels are awesome, and I like having the band to carry the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied but not excited. Feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Not what was expected or rather hoped for, but should have known. Disappointed to say the least. None of the purples match. The towels are basically shop towels with cheap print on them and the print is missing from the pad. BUT my real goal in purchasing this was the 1/2 inch pad so I'm at least happy with that. Would I purchase again? No.
customer_reviews.author: Horse Gentler 🐎

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Don't expect much. The thickness of the mat throws off your balance and the mat began tearing and stretching after one use. The towels are thin and an inexpensive microfiber (good for dusting but not so much for a sweaty face or body). Have gotten a decent amount of use from the blocks and strap (which is why I didn't return the set). The band is an inexpensive elastic and stretches out but not back to size.
customer_reviews.author: iHearTarot

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It came as expected. No problems with the item (no nicks, tears, etc.). The towels are soft and easy to wash. The color matched the photos (I'm a fan of green in general). Cons: There was a plastic-like smell, but letting it air out for a few days helped. The black straps for the yoga mat are flimsy; they slipped off when I tried to carry it home.
customer_reviews.author: C. L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this set.
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Really nice. We'll see if the mat holds up. Had my last mat for over 10 years. I like this one better because the handle comes off and the elastic makes it easy to put back on. No Velcro straps hanging off it. Nice and soft. Pleased so far. Used it 10 times before reviewing.
customer_reviews.author: Chrispy11

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set during a lighting sale and it is excellent. The mat is thicker than most I've ever used. I have found that using this mat on a plush carpet makes it a little difficult to stay in some balancing poses. I usually move it onto a hard surface for balance poses. The strap is awesome as are the blocks and towels. Very happy overall with this purchase. I can't estimate wear on the mat because it's still relatively new, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMit

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this yoga set!! I've been looking for a good one for quite a while, and am thrilled to have found this set. The mat itself is very well made, and is incredibly soft yet firm. I have a very bad back, and it's rather hard to do a lot of yoga due to the hardness of the floor. This set, however, makes it so much easier. I also really like the blocks, as they help immensely with some of the physical therapy I have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Liz V.

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this set
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this set. I have suffered from knee pain on other yoga mats and had to deal with tearing, but with this mat I have not had to deal with any of that. The mat is very thick and supportive and is a good length (I am 5 ft 9 in). You can't beat the price with what you get. The blocks are good and sturdy and so is the strap and the towels do the trick. It is not a high end Manuka by any stretch, but it definitely beats some of the mats you find at stores. Overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dacia Ketterer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box. This mat is thicker than the ones I have purchased in the past for family members. I can put it on my tile floor and be perfectly comfortable and I’m not a small person. Great quality towels and the blocks are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - material causes skin to sweat when I’m contact with it
customer_reviews.text: This mat has a nice thickness to it but unfortunately I did not like the way it made my hands in particular sweat when they were in contact with it, this was something I had never experienced with previous mats. Also the towels are thin and not very absorbent. I did not feel it was good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Wrong colors!
customer_reviews.text: I waited so long to get this exact shade of purple but when it arrived only the towel was the pretty purple shade! Everything else was the shade of purple that I can’t stand looking at. I’m so disapppinted but it’s too annoying to deal with returns at the moment so I’m going to keep it but hate it.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic727

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Everything came before the estimated shipping date. The mat had a weird smell but I let it air out for a few days and it went away. The mat is a bit thicker than I thought it would be but I’ve actually grown to like it better than the thin mats. The blocks are super sturdy and the towels absorb and wash great. The strap is thick and strong and can be thrown in the wash too, just leave it to air dry. I would definitely recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Strong Rubber Odor
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mat for about a month now and it has a very strong smell of rubber that doesn't go away. I've left it in a room with the window open, wiped it with clorox wipes as well as detergent and the rubber smell persists. It's a nice thickness and a comfortable workout mat, but it stinks!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The mat is not good for actually doing yoga. Slips and slides on the floor and I’m unable to get a good grip especially for inversion. It’s a great thickness for recovery stretching but not so much others. Towel isn’t particularly absorbent even after a couple of washes. Blocks and straps are good. A little disappointing but I guess it’s a cheap set to get.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It's light weight, firm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this yoga mat. It's quite thick, yet firm and very comfortable. It's also very light weight. It's easy to roll up and put into the carrier that came with it. The yoga blocks are light weight and firm. The strap is fine too. I like the color as well. It stands out nicely in my yoga class.
customer_reviews.author: Fanny Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a great cost! All of it functions well, I love the hand towel for general gym use and none of it had that weird cheap rubber smell when I opened it. The mat is nice and thick while still being light, the blocks are also sturdy and lighter than a pair of cork blocks I had previously. All in all a great set!
customer_reviews.author: Shantea

customer_reviews.title: Soft and squishy in all the right places
customer_reviews.text: This set included everything my wife was looking for to bring to hot yoga with her, including a thicker than standard mat with roll straps, a pair of blocks for her head stand type maneuvers, a mat towel, and more. She was very excited to be able to stop using the thin, older mat she had, and start using this, which she describes as being like a mattress where the old was like several sheets paper stacked.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Set
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the thick mat. Her class is held in a room with a cement floor so the extra cush is a plus. The strap is nice and long and everything seems to be made well. She got the pink and loves the color. The blocks are firm and large enough to stand on. Comes boxed and would make a great gift for a yoga beginner.
customer_reviews.author: missdaisy

customer_reviews.title: Strong fishy smell
customer_reviews.text: This yoga mat is nice and thick which is why I bought it. It keeps my knees/hips from hurting when doing poses that put pressure on them. In that respect it is great. I've had it for quite a while now and it still has a strong somewhat fishy odor. I've aired it out, cleaned it with yoga mat cleaner...the smell persists. Also, I use toeless yoga socks and permanent marks are left in the mat from the sole grips even after only one use. All in all, it gets the job done and is decent for the price, but I probably will buy something else when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: This is the set to buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I received and have used my Sivan Yoga set and I LOVE it!! It came in a timely matter. There is no weird smells or fading or missing pieces. The mat is thick and does not slide. The towels are so soft and did not lose that softness when washed. The strap is thick and very useful for posing. The blocks are firm yet soft and I just love everything in the set. I would highly recommend this to any and everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Miric

customer_reviews.title: Not moisture whicking
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that it does not roll out flat and it holds the rolled position. It rips and tears easily since it is foam. It also slipped and slid as I was doing soem flow yoga. During hot yoga my sweat just pooled on the mat. I definitely do not recommend for anything other than at home simpke yoga. I would spend the little extra money for something that will last a while. The couple pros I found were the comfortability on my joints and I enjoy the added balance challenge with the thicker mat. It is also very spacious. I'm short at only 5'1" so I think it would do well for a taller person still.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Gloss

customer_reviews.title: This yoga mat is perfect for my knee issues when I exercise
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a thicker yoga mat to provide more comfort for my knees. I have pain in my knees when I have to get on them for exercise and a regular yoga mat is too thin and uncomfortable. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SageCrone

customer_reviews.title: The thickness on this mat is amazing. I no longer have sore knees after a ...
customer_reviews.text: The thickness on this mat is amazing. I no longer have sore knees after a flow and I don't have to fuss around with a blanket or anything. The whole kit is fantastic. I really enjoy the towels because I don't slip and slide while doing hot yoga anymore! Plus the color is really soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jac S

customer_reviews.title: A well-made, high quality and attractive product.
customer_reviews.text: Understand that my rating of this product is based solely on visuals as I opened the package. I was quite please by what I saw, but I have never before owned a yoga mat and have yet to take my first lesson. Nevertheless, this set is very attractive and seems to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Wm. von Eiff

customer_reviews.title: but after learning how to use and incorporate them into my routine I can say that they are very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Matt is thick and cushy enough for my bony knees not to hurt when I'm on a hardwood floor, but not too cushy to have effected my balance. The towels are very soft and absorbent. I had never used a strap or a block before, so I have nothing to compare these to, but after learning how to use and incorporate them into my routine I can say that they are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the Sivan 6piece set because it had everything I would need and the price was great. When I checked out the mat it w
customer_reviews.text: I'm older but need to still stretch and stay mobile. I purchased the Sivan 6piece set because it had everything I would need and the price was great. When I checked out the mat it was thick and comfortable. My knees need that these days. It is not slippery and stays in place. The strap is another item I really wanted and that is durable and made well. For the money it is everything you need. Prompt delivery and I'm very satisfied with the company. Comes in a lot of colors too. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Beginner buy!
customer_reviews.text: So this is in general a BEGINNER yoga mat and set. But for that it is very high quality for the price, the mat is sturdy but not the 'best' on the market, and you shouldn't expect it to be for only $38. I liked that it came with a nice towel and the blocks we're a big part of my choice to go with this set. They are sturdy and comfortable, definitely a good choice to buy! I know I'll be investing in a better mat at some point, but for my beginner needs this is a perfect buy.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Nice all in one pack.
customer_reviews.text: If you are just starting yoga and do not know what all you will need , it is in there . I like the density I do not feel like I am sitting on a hard ground because it is a quality mat . The seller got it out fast which was nice I am happy to have spent the money on a mat that feels comfortable and not a 10.00 mat that would make me feel worse than when I began .
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these sets. I had been using my 3mm yoga mat to do my stretches on but my knees and ankles would hurt from the floor. This mat is thick enough to pad my bony joints and allow me to stretch comfortably. The yoga blocks are pretty standard (course I feel like I need about 20 of them at times)I have not had much opportunity to use the towels or the strap. I love this set and would recommend it to anyone looking for a thick mat/yoga starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy everything included with this set
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy everything included with this set, outside of the yoga mat--which unfortunately, was one of the main reasons why I purchased it. I do actively use the towels, blocks, and strap. The yoga mat included is just too thick for me to practice yoga on. Not to mention, it is not easy to roll up and place into my yoga bag given the thickness. Overall, a good set but if you're looking for a yoga mat, I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not Great for Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my yoga practice, and I can only use it with the towel over it. The basket-weave that is missing on this from other mats really help you stick (something I didn't realize at the time), so I'm constantly adjusting when I'm in down dog and other forms.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Complete yoga kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit is perfect for beginning yoga students. This was purchased for a family member and they are quite pleased that the kit included many of the items useful for beginners. And the quality of the materials is excellent. Not to mention, there was a nice selection of colors to personalize the items.
customer_reviews.author: D R Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit to get started at home
customer_reviews.text: I've started doing yoga at home from videos online and needed this kit to perform all the poses comfortably. A living room rug or towel is less than ideal. The mat is a little thicker than others I've used which I like; but probably a matter of personal preference. Blocks come in handy as I'm nowhere near as flexible as the instructors. Towel and blanket aren't necessary, but nice-to-haves (at least for me). I imagine if you progress to more vigorous workouts they'll be more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Tlc99

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: The mat itself slips. It is thicker than most yoga mats, but the quality really lacks. Odor is still lasting 3 weeks after opening. The towels also have a lot of lint and irritate the skin when rubbed across to dry. Pretty much useless. Only the blocks in this set worked well. Might have to return this set, was really expecting better.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, everything you need
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely mat! I have never had such a nice thick Yoga mat before, It’s truly a pleasure to use, and it comes with a handy strap that’s easy to use. It also comes with 2 towels, and two blocks. This is the perfect set to own if you do Yoga! You won’t need to use any of the smelly gross stuff they lend you at class! Awesome value, for very high quality. I’m so glad I made this purchase, and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Anne M

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Kit
customer_reviews.text: I love the thickness of the mat. It's nice and soft. Everything is as it should be. Great Vendor. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: I was drawn to it because of accessories like towels (which are microfiber) and blocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat right before starting yoga for the first time. I was drawn to it because of accessories like towels (which are microfiber) and blocks. All and all, after one C1 class at Corepower Yoga, there were indents in my mat from my hands/feet, and most annoyingly, from my toenails (which are very short). Ended up returning the mat, for a full refund, with no problems from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea P.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Don't do yoga with your dog on the mat..you will get puncture marks from your dogs nails in the mat. The mat is nice but also slippery. I had to buy yoga socks to go with it. Other than that all products work as they are. I don't like posting reviews but I want to stop getting emailed over and over again about posting one so here..
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent set of yoga products
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent set of yoga products. Mat is much thicker which is very nice for your knees and in general make the whole practice of very low impact (i would suggest to make it even better, adding a Pilates ball, a little one - it could also be instead of one of the blocks-). Anyway, I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Maria (Vzla)

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when wet
customer_reviews.text: Very slippery when sweating. Why this wasn't made with texturing is baffling. All mats should be no-slip. Very disappointed and nearly hurt myself several times.
customer_reviews.author: Jefe

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: The mat was to thick and kept sliding off of it, this is not a for hot yoga use at all ( or any use if you plan on sweating). But for the many items I received with this , it was a great deal. Never hurts to have a extra backup.
customer_reviews.author: JasperLe1

customer_reviews.title: Worth the affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: This set is really nice quality! I have tile floors, and have had surgery on both knees, so knee contact on the floor without a good mat isn't happening. This 1/2" mat provides the extra cushion for poses with knee contact, without slipping. And I love the bright aqua color. No strong odors, the blocks were firm, the towels really soft and absorbent. This set was everything I needed to get started with yoga, but not too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dancing

customer_reviews.title: Best by far
customer_reviews.text: For someone who is new to yoga, but experienced in weight training. This mat and set is by far the best ive seen and felt even in retail stores. I highly recommend this set. Look forward to buying other products from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga mat, colors are a bit off
customer_reviews.text: This yoga mat is fantastic - I've finally decided to get into yoga and I really do appreciate the good quality of this yoga set. I only took off one start b/c I believe the colors are a bit misleading - it's slightly lighter (more of a seafoam green) than I think the marketing pictures display.
customer_reviews.author: coffeescripting

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality and used!!!
customer_reviews.text: The towel came in used. I called Amazon and they gave me $15 back so I did not return it, but it went to the garbage. The whole set is just very bad quality. As soon as you touch the blocks - you leave a mark. If you are not very, very careful - you will damage it just by handling it. Waste of money, sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Perisic

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret to buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I do yoga but always hurts my knees with the yoga mats,but this one is really confortable and really thick,plus with the towel I put on top,don’t slip or fall!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for your money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the price was steep but when I got my package finally (it was stolen initially and Amazon wasted no time getting me another one) I opened up yoga heaven! The mat feels like clouds and it is BIG (but not too big) and the towels and everything else is a SUPER bonus! I would have paid just for the mat!
customer_reviews.author: Kak

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed I'll be buying him a different set
customer_reviews.text: Don't care for the set. Purchased it for my husband, the box arrived damaged, the mat is thick but it holds the impression of your hands and feet, has rub wear marks on the surface after only two uses, the strap with the set is cheaply made. Not worth the cost, very disappointed I'll be buying him a different set.
customer_reviews.author: plowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a wile back and I use it every day and it's still going strong. My husband and I usually go through yoga mats very quickly and they usually start shredding on us but not this one. It's great!!! It is extra soft and doesn't hurt my wrist, knees and hips.
customer_reviews.author: Yaiza

customer_reviews.title: As described - Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The product came exactly as described with no issues and it's quite dense making it work very well on even tile flooring. I say that as a 6'1" 175lb Man btw. So if you are smaller than that in any capacity this set will do you right :) My girl also loves it :P
customer_reviews.author: Brett Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 sets from Amazon in Feb 2018. I’ve been using it since May 2018. I notice after using it almost every day, 6 months after, it starts to become slippery. The mat didn’t stick to the floor anymore. And now, 1 year and 5 months, I can’t handle it not to write the review. I post some pictures, this is what happens to the mat. Haven’t tried other brand for this long. But I must say, this mat durability is only for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great for cushioning joints; mars easily, though
customer_reviews.text: I love my thick yoga mat because it relieves pressure on my joints. The black strap has started to slip off, though. I will soon have to swap it out. Also, the material seems to pit and mar pretty easily. It does a good job, but it won't stay looking pretty for long with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Newberry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've recently started practicing Yoga and really didn't know what to buy. When my instructor saw my purchase, she was WOWED of the quality of the set. I highly recommend this product. It comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Lady C.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. Everything a new student or an experianced practitioner would need. This set is well made and well priced. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat and the towels are good quality. They are soft and wash up well. The blocks are sturdy and this mat makes for a great place to do yoga or just to do stretching and floor exercises after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Wright

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful yoga set
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful !! I love it!!! Super soft and it is well worth the money. It arrived very fast!! A day early I couldn’t wait to open the box. All of you if you’re new to yoga like my self and for those who are experienced with yoga get this set!! You will love it!!
customer_reviews.author: rose water

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my niece for college graduation. A yoga lover helped me pick it out. For the price you get all the basics. A high quality thick mat, blocks, and a strap for positions. A bonus is the towel. I think she will love it. Arrived on time in a nice box. Perfect for a beginning yoga star or pro that needs a thicker pad for joints or for a larger framed person.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy B

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked pretty but I havent tried it not a single time, will update after trying but upon inspection everything was PERFECT and as advertised, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Dalia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Esp for the price
customer_reviews.text: I officially love yoga blocks! I've never used them before. I use them in my workouts too to help me balance. Sometimes I put it under my back when I'm doing bridges and other poses. I love how thick the yoga mat is, it feels great on my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

product_meta.title: Sivan Health and Fitness Yoga Set 6-Piece– Includes 1/2" Ultra Thick NBR Exercise Mat, 2 Yoga Blocks, 1 Yoga Mat Towel, 1 Yoga Hand Towel and a Yoga Strap
feature_bullets: Package includes: 1/2" NBR Yoga Mat/ 2 Yoga Blocks/ 1 - 68”x24” Yoga Mat Towel/ 1 – 30”x20” Yoga Hand Towel/ 1 Yoga Strap

1/2" ultra thick yoga mat with specially designed memory foam – Ribbed surface on one side with a smooth surface on the other; the non-slip surface grips the floor to prevent injuries – Features an integrated carry strap
Provide support and balance with our durable foam yoga blocks and deepen your stretch with our 6.5ft yoga strap that allows for better extension of the body
Our 68”x24” and 30”x20” yoga towels are designed with microfiber technology and prime absorption to provide slip-resistant and sweat-free workouts
Great for yoga, pilates, stretching and toning workouts – 71" long 24" wide yoga mat ensures comfort for people of all shapes and sizes

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
